title: The Waiting
author: Claire, Regi
snippet: Five  minutes  later,  Mr  Stewart  tells  me  that  Yoyo  is  fine  and  can be collected from Summerhall Square after three.

title: The Waiting
author: Claire, Regi
snippet: Quarter past nine and not a squeak from the back bedroom. I  leave a note for Rachel to let her know we're off to the Dick Vet's  in Summerhall Square. Yoyo doesn't protest when I lift him into  my wicker shopping trolley, then wheel him along the streets like  an invalid in a bath chair.
